name: Chorus of Truth
text: Make an Arcana check. Creatures within 5 squares of you while you perform the ritual take a penalty to Bluff checks determined by your check result. The penalty lasts for the duration of the ritual.
flavorText: Falsehood rings like dissonance against the beautiful harmonies of your instrument.
componentCost: 200 gp, plus a focus worth 1,000 gp
